data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pham, Nhi Thi, Broad, Gavin R., Wägele, Wolfgang J. (2013): First record of the genus Zaglyptus Förster (Hymenoptera: Ichneumonidae: Pimplinae) from Vietnam, with description of one new species. Zootaxa 3702 (5): 483-492, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3702.5.7
